description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment of Planning Permission ref: 17/15023/FUL (Variation of Condition 2 (plans) and condition 8 (extensions) of planning permission 17/14694/FUL (variation of conditions 2 (plans) of planning permission 16/15349/FUL (section 73 to vary approved drawings, conditions 12 and 13) of planning application 11/14479/FUL (demolition of existing detached swimming pool building and erection of two-storey 7 bedroom detached house with basement and accommodation in the roofspace and single storey detached garage) for revisions to overall design approach including fenestration, dormer windows, rooflights and chimneys.) for single storey extensions to rear of detached garage to create swimming pool and changing rooms). Amendment to include Insertion of external doorway to ground floor office
